item.title: Tweet
item.description: Lol, Elon’s new #stay@work slogan is really helping. I’ve had the same tweet struck at the top of my timeline for a day now. Below it is normal… Somebody is messing with the algo, and fucking it up. Perhaps #stayInBed might be wise. ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
